channel.title: Umm quests
channel.description: Hello i messed with the quest window (there were invisible armour etc...) and i managed to mess it up so it is atm like in real rs , anyone knows the code how i can getit back , please give me the right code , and where to add it. Thanks

item.title: Umm quests
item.dc:creator: @kristo_21 kristo 21
item.description:
@kristo_21 wrote:

Umm i got it like this atm

[code]public int questid = 0;
public int q1stage = 0;
public int q2stage = 0;
public int q3stage = 0;
public int q4stage = 0;
public int totalqp = 0;

public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) {
totalqp += rewardqp;
showInterface(297);
sendQuest(“Congratulations!”, 299);
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 300);
sendQuest(“You are awarded”, 6156);
sendQuest(“Earned QP:”, 6158);
sendQuest(“Total QP:”, 303);
sendQuest(“You have completed “+questName, 301);
sendQuest(””+rewardqp, 4444);
sendQuest(""+totalqp, 304);
}

public void loadquest(String questname, String questinfo1, String questinfo2, String questinfo3, String questinfo4, String questinfo5, String questinfo6, String questinfo7, String questinfo8, String questinfo9)
{
sendQuest("@dre@Quest", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8145);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8147);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8148);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8149);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8150);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8151);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8152);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8153);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8154);
sendQuest(“Kristo”, 8155);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

public void loadquestinterface()
{
sendQuest(“Wohoo”, 640);
sendQuest(“Wohoo”,663);
sendQuest(“Wohoo”, 682); // 2848,3109
sendQuest(“Wohoo”, 3985);
;

}[/code]

Read full topic

@exe626 wrote:

Snaps, I can answer this, look at the source before you tampered with it, and you got the code! btw, you removed an entire list of code and didn’t think it would do anything? Set all the frames, then leave them blank or add text if you please, I don’t even code RS servers anymore and I know that.
